name: KilupreDEMO- eng
description:
KILUPRE: tells the story of the character Javier Ortega (Rex), an overwhelmed waiter on a luxury cruise ship who is attacked by the 'blues',

a military group that will take prisoners to take them to an island called KILUPRE, where they will break all the ethics and morals of the characters, leaving

free from their own minds. '' REX '' will have to survive his anxiety and the primitive fauna of the island while Jeremias (leader of the blues) tries enter his mind to be able to '' free him '' and at the same time hide the truth about KILUPRE.

(use only mouse to play. forget about the keyboard)

-RPZ

To finish this project, I need your help on patreon.

https://www.patreon.com/RPZeptilus?fan_landing=true
